config.okzoomer.title: Ok Zoomer Config
config.okzoomer.cinematic_camera.tooltip:
Defines the cinematic camera while zooming.
"Off" disables the cinematic camera.
"Vanilla" uses Vanilla's cinematic camera.
"Multiplied" is a multiplied variant of "Vanilla".
config.okzoomer.reduce_sensitivity.toolt: Reduces the mouse sensitivity when zooming.
config.okzoomer.zoom_transition.tooltip:
Adds transitions between zooms.
"Off" disables transitions.
"Smooth" replicates Vanilla's dynamic FOV.
"Linear" removes the smoothness.
config.okzoomer.zoom_mode.tooltip:
The behavior of the zoom key.
"Hold" needs the zoom key to be hold.
"Toggle" has the zoom key toggle the zoom.
"Persistent" makes the zoom permanent.
config.okzoomer.zoom_scrolling.tooltip: Allows to increase or decrease zoom by scrolling.
config.okzoomer.extra_keybinds.tooltip:
Adds zoom manipulation keys along with the zoom key.
A restart will be required in order to apply the changes.
config.okzoomer.zoom_overlay.tooltip:
Adds an overlay in the screen during zoom.
"Vignette" uses a vignette as the overlay.
"Spyglass" uses the spyglass overlay with the vignette texture.
The overlay texture can be found at: assets/okzoomer/textures/misc/zoom_overlay.png
config.okzoomer.category.values.tooltip: Contains precise configuration of the zoom.
config.okzoomer.zoom_divisor.tooltip: The divisor applied to the FOV's zoom multiplier.
config.okzoomer.minimum_zoom_divisor.too: The minimum value that you can scroll down.
config.okzoomer.maximum_zoom_divisor.too: The maximum value that you can scroll up.
config.okzoomer.scroll_step.tooltip: The number which is decremented or incremented by zoom scrolling. Used when the zoom divisor is above the starting point.
config.okzoomer.lesser_scroll_step.toolt: The number which is decremented or incremented by zoom scrolling. Used when the zoom divisor is below the starting point.
config.okzoomer.smooth_multiplier.toolti: The multiplier used for smooth transitions.
config.okzoomer.cinematic_multiplier.too: The multiplier used for the multiplied cinematic camera.
config.okzoomer.minimum_linear_step.tool: The minimum value which the linear transition step can reach.
config.okzoomer.maximum_linear_step.tool: The maximum value which the linear transition step can reach.
config.okzoomer.category.tweaks.tooltip: Contains options that are unlikely to be changed from the defaults.
config.okzoomer.reset_zoom_with_mouse.to: Allows for resetting the zoom with the middle mouse button.
config.okzoomer.unbind_conflicting_key.t: If pressed, then the "Save Toolbar Activator" keybind will be unbound if there's a conflict with the zoom key.
config.okzoomer.use_spyglass_texture.too: If enabled, the spyglass overlay texture is used instead of Ok Zoomer's overlay texture.
config.okzoomer.use_spyglass_sounds.tool: If enabled, the zoom will use spyglass sounds on zooming in and out.
config.okzoomer.print_owo_on_start.toolt: Prints a random owo in the console when the game starts.
config.okzoomer.hide_zoom_overlay.toolti: Hides the zoom overlay while the HUD's hidden.
config.okzoomer.category.reset.tooltip: Contains a way to reset this mod's settings
config.okzoomer.preset.tooltip:
The preconfiguration which will be used after a reset.
"Default" resets to the default settings.
"Classic" makes the mod imitate OptiFine's zoom.
"Persistent" is based on the "Persistent" zoom mode.
"Spyglass" emulates the spyglass zoom.
config.okzoomer.reset_settings.tooltip: Resets the settings to the preset.
toast.okzoomer.title: Ok Zoomer
toast.okzoomer.acknowledge_mod: The mod is allowed by this server
